inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of mitral valve insufficiency with or without coronary artery disease and a
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: findings of acute or chronic renal failure (serum creatinine (sCr)> 1.5 mg/dL)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe hepatic disease (alanine aminotransferase or aspartate aminotransferase > 100 U litre/L)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (forced expired volume in 1 s < 50 % of predicted or < 2.0 litre)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of prior coronary artery bypass graft (CABG) surgery or myocardial infarction (MI) within the previous month
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has had type 1 diabetes for 11 years and has been on insulin since diagnosis. He has never been prescribed oral agents for diabetes management.
